title: Result after placement games
body:
Hi there.

I just finished my placement games with a new account.

I went 10/0 and i got placed in bronze IV. How is that possible? Any idea?

replies.body: Went 10-0 on fresh acc, gold III :D
What is the mmr on your account?

op.gg (I know its sht) says 1,093 (Bronze 2)

as i said, i just reached lvl 30 with this acc some weeks ago and started this as a new smurf. but im really wondering how this is possible.
